sqlMap.update: update T_Stowage_Main set id=#id# ,stowage_number=#stowage_number# ,stowage_statue=#stowage_statue# ,departure_time=#departure_time# ,car_id=#car_id# ,plan_arrivle=#plan_arrivle# ,emp_id=#emp_id# ,start_city=#start_city# ,start_branch=#start_branch# ,end_branch=#end_branch# ,end_branch_linkname=#end_branch_linkname# ,end_branch_linktelephone=#end_branch_linktelephone# ,main_memo=#main_memo# ,freight=#freight# ,prepay=#prepay# ,other_payment=#other_payment# ,back_payment=#back_payment# ,arrive_payment=#arrive_payment# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Stowage_Main WHERE id IN(#ids#)
